title: Protect My Heart
description: Emma Howard has sworn off hot guys, but Arie Blackwell has sworn to protect her.After a series of cheating ex-boyfriends, Emma goes on a self-prescribed boy cleanse and plans to spend her senior year focused on the important things in life, like deciding which college to attend. She has no idea she’s an heiress with a target on her back and boys are the least of her worries.Arie thinks his college internship will be easy: pose as a high school senior and protect Emma. He never expected to fall for her.Sparks ignite, but danger is near. If Arie can’t keep Emma hidden, her fate will be infinitely worse than falling for the guy she shouldn’t want. “Protect My Heart is a fabulous book, with sigh-worthy kisses and a hero you can't help but fall in love with. You don't want to miss this sweet romance.” - Victorine E. Lieske, NYT's bestselling author.
author: Judy Corry
